wikipedia_page.main: Charles John Guthrie, Lord Guthrie FRSE FRSGS LLD (4 April 1849 in Edinburgh – 28 April 1920 in Edinburgh) was a Scottish judge and lawyer.

response: * Charles John Guthrie, Lord Guthrie (1849–1920), Senator of the College of Justice
*Charles John Guthrie, Lord Guthrie (1849–1920), Scottish judge

link_mentions.page: Royal Commission on the Ancient and Historical Monuments of Scotland

response: His daughter Christina Chalmers Burns married James Guthrie of Pitforthie, a banker and son of Rev Dr Thomas Guthrie. His daughter Anne Jemima, married Charles John Guthrie, Lord Guthrie.
